banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: Democratizing investing

nodes.whoTheyAre: Nathan Ide is an intermediary sales manager who is passionate about empowered investing and is known for his ability to inspire all investors to take an active interest in investing. At SPDR ETFs Australia, he is responsible for sales and business development to private banks, stock brokers and independent financial advisors. Having studied economics, finance and philosophy, Ide has a Bachelor of Commerce from the University of Sydney.

videoData.description: In 2013, the largest experiment in crowd-sourced investing happened in Australia, as everyday citizens took the reins on investing the country's pension fund. Nathan Ide explores how certain cultural characteristics of Australians have inspired this groundbreaking model for managing pensions.
videoData.socialDescription: In 2013, the largest experiment in crowd-sourced investing happened in Australia, as everyday citizens took the reins on investing the country's pension fund. Nathan Ide explores how certain cultural characteristics of Australians have inspired this groundbreaking model for managing pensions.
